modName: Siege Bow Automaton - Automated Siege Bow
summary: Add new features to the original Siege Bow Collection
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT: Requires Skyrim and all dlcs latest patch, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22706/?]this mod meshes and textures[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15209/?] this mod[/url].
Also if you want to play with this mod download the original siegebow [url=http://lmgtfy.com/?q=Siege+bow+collection]elsewhere.[/url]

[youtube]442pdokT-i4[/youtube]

[size=3][b][u]Description[/u][/b][/size]

[color=red]Warning[/color]: There's a lot of explosions and knocking effects in this mod. So use it carefully, you don't want to knock yourself out by your own explosions

[color=red] Compatible with SkyRe! [/color]

[color= #EABE83][b]Behemoth Warrior LB-II[/b][/color] (LB-II: LongBow v2)

Classification: Long Bow
Quiver capacity: 6 Ballista bolts
Range: Long

This long bow has the capacity to shoot a ballista bolts that deals tremendous damage at cost of slow drawing and movement speed.

[b][u]Bow sub-effects[/u][/b]
-Impact Shot: 40% chance to fire a fiery bolt that knocks the target down leaving a flaming line on the ground
-Nuke Shot: 10% chance to send a nuke bolt that knocks away the target and surrounding ennemies
-Pinpoint Shot: 10% chance to send a laser beam that stuns everybody within 40 yards
-Bullet Time: 30% chance to enter bullet time which stops time completly for 10 seconds
-Sure kill: 5% chance to shoot a bolt that deals 1million damage to the target... basically an insta kill. Kill everything except Dragons

[color= #EABE83][b]Leviathan Siege SB-II[/b][/color] (SB-II: ShortBow V2)

Classification: Short Bow
Quiver capacity: 500 Blade discs
Range: Mid

This short bow has the capacity to shoot 500 blade discs when hold the left-click mouse button for 2sec or a regular shot if hold at least 1 sec. This weapon have a fast fire rate

[b][u]Bow sub-effects[/u][/b]
-Impact Shot: 30% chance to fire a fiery bolt that knocks the target down leaving a flaming line on the ground
-Chain Lightning: 5% chance to send a chain lightning.
-Bullet Time: 30% chance to enter bullet time which stops time completly for 10 seconds
-Sure kill: 1% chance to shoot a bolt that deals 1million damage to the target... basically an insta kill. Kill everything except Dragons
-Automaton Minions: Summons various automaton to aid you via Power.

[color= #EABE83][b]Goliath Enforcer CB-SG IV[/b][/color] (CB-SG IV: CrossBow-ShotGun v4)

Classification: Crossbow
Quiver capacity: 37 Spike balls
Range: Close

This Crossbow has the capacity to shoot 2 spike balls when hold the left-click mouse button for 2sec or a regular shot if hold at least 1 sec. Depending from the distance between you and your target, the closer the higher the damage. This weapon have a medium fire rate.

[b][u]Bow sub-effects[/u][/b]
-Nerves Chaining: 5% chance to send a chain lightning that deals no damage but paralyze.
-Bullet Time: 30% chance to enter bullet time which stops time completely for 10 seconds
-Medkit: 33% chance to heal yourself
-Disarm: 66% chance to disarm
-Sure kill: 1% chance to shoot a bolt that deals 1million damage to the target... basically an insta kill. Kill everything except Dragons
-Reflective Shield: 15% chance to cast a shield that will reflect any hostile spells (Needs [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15209/?] this mod[/url])


[size=3][b][u]Where to get[/u][/b][/size]:

You can craft them under Dwarven section.
To get a higher damage version you will needs the right perk to craft them.

[size=3][b][u]Bug[/u][/b][/size]:

Minor Bug: Siege Crossbow has a bug where a spike projectile will spawn in front of your face when reloading a save after using it.

[size=3][b][u]Recommendation[/u][/b][/size]:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286] SkyRe by T3nd0s [/url]


[size=3][b][u]Credit[/u][/b][/size]:
Thank to Earitory for uploading
Thaks to J3X for Auto-firing Script
Thank to Rising for the awesome Siege Bow
Creation Kit
Bethesda
